page.title: 09THE PARISH HALL
page.content: { THE PARISH HALL} This hall which was recently built now provides a focus for much of the village life and serves as a centre for local entertainment and organistion. The Parish Hall has a management committee with a chairman and 8 elected members, a booking secretary and a caretaker. It is used for wedding receptions, parties, whist drives, council meetings, badminton, auctions, indoor markets, concerts and St.Keverne Young Peoples' Club (SKYP). This is held every Thursday except in school holidays. The younger members use the hall first followed by the teenagers. An annual pantomime is held here performed by the St. Keverne Kaudlers. Discos are supervised by 1 or 2 of the management committee. The Church Synod also meet here annually.
